awd_abstract_narration: This is a part of a coordinated research program in seismic                     precast concrete structures.  This projects will develop a                      limit state design methodology for precast concrete structures                  present design standards and past research in structural                        reliability theory will be drawn upon.  The methodology will                    be able to incorporate the energy dissipative and other                         innovative characteristics used in the connection design, and                   will be updated and expanded to incorporated the current                        research findings.                                                                                                                                              The design recommendations at the completion of the project                     will ensure maximum technology transfer of new and innovative                   research results.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
